it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

Class TurnController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.Controller
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.TurnController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher, Observer<VCEvent>, VCEventDispatcher

    public class TurnController
extends Controller
    This class handles the interaction with a user throughout its turn, showing them the possible combos to use, allowing them to spawn or respawn and refreshing the game board at the end of the turn before moving on. See Controller.
